QuestData.Title: Crush Captain Brightwater!
QuestData.Description: With every advance, our men are met by fresh Alliance reinforcements. It's almost as though their commander anticipates my every move!$B$BThe time has come for good Captain Brightwater to meet his end. He commands his troops from aboard an Alliance destroyer at the far end of the bay.$B$BThis will be no easy fight, $n. Take along a couple of trusted friends, or if you have a key to one of those repaired shredders, use it to disembowel Brightwater! Either way, he must fall!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Captain Brightwater and report to General Khazgar at Venture Bay.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you eliminated the enemy captain?
QuestData.RewardText: You are a true soldier of the Horde, $N. Your bravery will inspire my men to victory!
